name: seed-bomb
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.
